EffectDescription.Description: %1%2 %3: Passive: %3 %4 Bonus to %2.
%1Armor Bonus %2: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting %2 armor bonus to AC, just as though you were wearing armor.
%1Armor Mastery %2: Passive: %2 %3 bonus to the Max Dex Bonus of your equipped light, medium or heavy armor. This benefit does not apply to the Max Dex Bonus of a Tower Shield
%1Armor Piercing %2: %2 %3 bonus to bypass enemy fortification.
%1Combat Mastery %2: %2 %3 bonus to the DC to resist Trip, Improved Trip, Sunder, Improved Sunder, Stunning Blow and Stunning Fist attempts.
%1Deadly %2: %2 %3 bonus to weapon damage.
%1Deathblock %2: Passive: %3 %4 Bonus to Negative Energy Absorption. In addition, you are immune to magical effects that can cause instant death.
%1Deception %2: %2 %3 bonus to hit and %4 Damage for Sneak Attacks.
Disintegration Guard: This item has a store of dark insidious power deep within. When hit in melee, this power occasionally lashes out violently at enemies an attempts to disintegrate them.
%1Distant Diversion %2: %2 %3 bonus to Decreased threat generated from ranged damage.
%1Diversion %2: %2 %3 bonus to Decreased threat generated from melee damage.
%1Dodge Bonus %2: %2 %3 bonus to Dodge.
%1Doubleshot %2: %2 %3 bonus to Doubleshot chance.
%1Doublestrike %2: %2 %3 bonus to Doublestrike chance.
DR %1: Reduces all physical damage by %1

Earthgrab Guard: This items stores the implacable strength of the earth deep within. When the wearer is hit in melee, this power will occasionally come to the surface calling on earth to erupt from the ground and hold an enemy in place.
%1Resistance: %2 %3 bonus to resist %4.
%1 Absorption - %2: Passive %2 %3 Bonus to %1 Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistances have been taken into account.)
Epic Captain's Set: When wearing both items from the Captain's Set, you gain a +2 Quality bonus to Strength
Epic The Devil's Handiwork:While wearing six items from The Devil's Handiwork you gain a +3 Quality bonus to all ability scores.
%1Fortification %2: Passive: %2 %3 Bonus to Fortification.
Feat %1: While equipped, this item grants the feat %1.
Freedom of Movement: This item grants its wearer the ability to move and attack normally while under then influence of maic that impedes movement, such as paralysis, solid fog, slow and web.

Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to your incopreality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.
Greater Boon of Undeath: Undead take solace in the hate of others. Every time you are struck in combat, an Inflict Moderate Wounds spell will be cast on you.

Greater Dispelling Guard: This item is infused with a power that purges out the magical energes of those that strike the wearer. When the wearer is hit in melee it will apply a Greater Dispel Magic effect on the attacker, stripping away its protective spells.
Greater Heroism: Passive: +4 Morale bonus to Attack Rolls, Saving Throws and Skill Checks.
Greater Marshwalker: This is one of the two pieces of the Greater Marshwalker set. Wehn both items are equipped you receive +30% striding and a +15 competence bonus to your Jump skill.

Greater Might of the Abishai: This is one of the five pieces of the Greater Might of the Abishai set. When any three are equipped you gain a +3 profane bonus to Natural Armor, Strength and a +3 bonus to your caster levels for evocation spells. When all five are equipped you also gain a +3 profane bonus to Constitution and Conjuration spells.
This item is imbued with an undeniable goodness that freely flows outward in a pleasant palpable current, constantly healing the wearer over time.
Greater Siren's Ward: When both items in this set are equipped you gain a +2 Insight bonus to your saves and a +4 Insight bonus to your AC.
%1Guard %2: When Hit in Melee: Deals %3 %4 damage to yout attacker.
Halcyon Mind: When you are damaged by an attack: 5% chance to gain 15 temporaray Spell Points. These last for 1 minute or until they are used.
%1Hit Points %2: Passive: %2 %3 Bonus to Hit Points.
%1Incite: %2 %3 Bonus increased threat generated from melee damage.
Disease Immunity: Grants its wearer immunity to disease effects.
Immunity to Fear: the wearer of this item is immune to all fear effects.
Immunity to Slippery Surfaces: The wearer of this item is not affected when walking on slippery surfaces.

Improved Quelling Strikes: On Vorpal Melee: Applies Quell to the target enemy for six seconds, rendering then unable to cast divine spells. 50% chance of peventing the target from casting all spells for 3 seconds (12 second cooldown).
Lesser Displacement: Equipping this item causes light to distort around you. Attacks from enemies have a 25% chance to miss you due to concealment.
%1Magical Sheltering %2: This item provides a %2 %3 bonus to your Magical Resistance Rating.
Negative Healing Amplification %1: %1 %2 Bonus to your vulnerability to Negative spells or effects. This increases the amount by which you are healed from Negative Energy if you are Undead.
Parrying %1: %1 Insight bonus to AC and saves.
%1Physical Sheltering %2: This item provides a %2 %3 bonus to your Physical Resistance Rating.
%1Potency: Passive: %2 %3 Bonus to Universal Spell Power.
%1Proof Against Disease %2: this item grants its wearer immunity to natural disease and also grants a %2 %3 bonus to saving throws against magical diseases.
Protection %1: Passive: %1 Deflection Bonus to Armor Class.
Raging Focus: While Raged, %1 Rage Bonus to Saves vs. Enchantments.
Reinforced Fists: this item surrounds your fists with kinetic energy. Your unarmed damage is boosted by one half die.
%1Resistance %2: %2 %3 bonus to saves.
Riposte: When its wearer is successfully attacked in melee, this item occasionally allows you to make an immediate counterattack, dealing bludgeoning damage to the offending enemy.
Riposte %1: %1 Insight bonus to AC and to saves.
Riposte %1: When missed by an attack: Deals %2 damage to your attacker. Passive: %3 Insight bonus to AC and saves.
Roar: this item emits a frightening roar when melee attackers score a critical hit on the weaer, causing them to resist or be shaken with fear.
%1%2 Save %3: This item gives a %3 %4 bonus to your %2 saves.
%1Seeker %2: Passive: %3 %4 Bonus to Critical Hit Damage and to rolls to confirm a critical hit. (Bonus critical hit damage is applied before weapon multipliers.)
%1Sheltering %2: This item provides a %2 %3 bonus to your Physical and Magical Resistance Ratings.
%1%2 %3: Passive: %3 %1 Bonus to the %2 skill.
Dexterity Skill - %2 Bonus %1: Passive %1 %2 Bonus to Balance, hide, Move Silently, Open Lock and Tumble
Intelligence Skill - %2 Bonus %1: Passive %1 %2 Bonus to Disable Device, Repair, Search and Spell Craft.
%1Shatter %2: this effect gives a %2 %3 bonus to the DC to resit Sunder and Improved Sunder attempts.
Soundproof: Protects against stunning, dazing and disorientation from sound-based spells such as Soundburst and Geater Shout.
Speed %1: %2 %3 bonus to Movement Speed and a %4 bonus to Attack Speed.
%1%2 Focus %3: Passive: %4 %5 bonus to the DC to resist your %2 spells.
%1Lore %2: %2 %3 Bonus to %4 Spells chance to Critical Hit.
%1Spell Penetration %2: Passive: %3 %4 Bonus to Spell Penetration checks.
%1%2 %3: Passive: %3 %4 Bonus to %5 Spell Power.
Spell Resistance(%1): This item grants its wearer %1 spell resistance.
Spiked: On Damage: %1 chance of dealing an addition %2 %3 Damage.
Spike Guard: On Being Hit in Melee: %1 chance to do %2 %3 Damage to the Attacker.

Staggering Blow: This item is enchanted to make your attacks send enemies reeling. When you roll a 20 on an attackk with a melee weapon you will knock the target down unless it makes a DC 17 Balance check.
Striding %1: Makes the wearer more fleet of foot, giving a %1 bonus to run speed.
Stone Prison Guard: This item has a chance to turn those who hit you to stone. A successful Fortitude DC17 save will negate this effect.

%1Stunning %2: If this effect is on a weapon, each attack that deals damage has a 3% chance to stun the target if it fails a DC 35 Fortitude Save. In addition this effect gives a %2 %3 bonus to the DC of your Stunning Blow/Fist abilities.
underwater Action: This item grants its wearer the ability to breathe water as if it were air.
Vengeful Fury: On Taking Damage: Gain %1 %2 Bonus to Doublestrike and a %3 Rage Bonus to your Attack Bonus.
%1Vertigo %2: %2 %3 bonus to the DC to resist Trip and Improved Trip attempts.
Vitality %1: Passive: %1 Vitality bonus to Hit points.

Way of the Sun Soul: When all three items from the set are equipped and you are in a centered state, you will gain +2 To-Hit and Damage rolls. In addition, when you roll a natural 20 on an attack that is confirmed as a critical hit, you will gain a temporary benefit based on the elemental stance you are in, if any.
%1Wizardry %2: Passive: %2 %3 Bonus to Spell Points. (If you have Sorcerer or Favored Soul levels, you gain additional spell points proportionate to the ratio of those levels to other classes).

Woodsman's Guile: This item is one of the three parts of the Woodsman's Guile set. When all three items are equipped you will gain a +4 bonus To-Hit and a +6 bonus to your damage for any attack considered a Sneak Attack.
